Project.Brief history of your project and organi: The project is DE Africa. It provide a routine, reliable and operational service, using Earth observations to deliver decision-ready products enabling policy makers, scientists, the private sector and civil society to address social, environmental and economic changes on the continent and develop an ecosystem for innovation across sectors.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The project provides data from Landsat 5, 7 and 8 satellites, including historical observations dating back to late 1980s and regularly updated new acquisitions. New Level-2 Landsat 7 and Landsat 8 data are available after 15 to 27 days from acquisition.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: Yes, our team is the data preparer. When we download the dataset, we use lotus from Filecoin to process data. The next step, we find storage provider to get data from us.
Project.Please share a sample of the data (a lin:
aws s3 ls --region af-south-1 --no-sign-request s3://deafrica-landsat/
aws s3 ls --region af-south-1 --no-sign-request s3://deafrica-landsat-inventory/
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, Africa, North America, South America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, IPFS, Shipping hard drives
